revision.comment: Added, changed some of the references
revision.text:
{{Infobox company | name = GNS Healthcare, Inc. | logo = [[File:GNS Healthcare Logo.png|frameless]] | caption = | type = [[Privately held company|Private]] (subsidiary of [[Via Science]]) | traded_as = | genre = | fate = | predecessor = | successor = | foundation = [[Ithaca, New York]], USA ({{Start date|2000}}) | founder = [[Colin C. Hill|Colin Hill]] (CEO)
[[Iya Khalil]] | defunct = | location_city = [[Cambridge, Massachusetts]] | location_country = USA | location = | locations = | area_served = | key_people = | industry = | products = | services = | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | aum = | assets = | equity = | owner = | num_employees = | parent = | divisions = | subsid = | homepage = {{URL|www.gnshealthcare.com}} | footnotes = | intl = }} '''GNS Healthcare''' is a privately held [[Analytics|data analytics]] company based in [[Cambridge, Massachusetts]] with offices in Cambridge and [[Ithaca, New York]]. Founded in 2000 by [[Cornell University|Cornell]] physicists [[Colin C. Hill|Colin Hill]] and [[Iya Khalil]], GNS Healthcare uses proprietary [[Causality|causal]] [[Bayesian network]] [[Computer simulation|modeling and simulation]] software to analyze data for clients in the [[Pharmaceutical industry|pharmaceutical]], [[biotechnology]], [[Health care provider|healthcare provider]], [[health insurance]], [[pharmacy benefit management]] and [[health informatics]] industries. Since November 2011, CEO [[Colin C. Hill|Colin Hill]] has authored the blog [http://blogs.forbes.com/colinhill/ "Healthcare 2020"] on [[Forbes|Forbes.com]]. == References == * Kolakowski, Nick (September 26, 2012) [http://slashdot.org/topic/bi/gns-healthcare-aetna-team-on-analytics-to-combat-metabolic-syndrome/ "GNS Healthcare, Aetna Team on Analytics to Combat Metabolic Syndrome"]. "Slashdot". * Cambia Health Solutions (April 18, 2012) [http://www.cambiahealth.com/news/2012-04-18-cambia-health-solutions-announces-investment-in-gns-healthcare.html "Cambia Health Solutions Announces Investment in GNS Healthcare"]. (Press release). * Miller, Katherine (January 2, 2012) [http://biomedicalcomputationreview.org/content/big-data-analytics-biomedical-research "Big Data Analytics In Biomedical Research"]. ''Biomedical Computation Review''. * Council on Competitiveness (June 30, 2011) [http://www.compete.org/news/entry/1743/council-on-competitiveness-showcases-power-of-high-performance-computing-in-case-study-with-gns-healthcare/ "Council on Competitiveness Showcases Power of High Performance Computing in Case Study with GNS Healthcare"] (Press release). == External links == * {{Official website|http://www.gnshealthcare.com/}} * [http://blogs.forbes.com/colinhill/ Healthcare 2020 blog on Forbes.com] [[Category:Health care companies of the United States]]
